features: MICROPHONE UNPARALLELED AUDIO EXCELLENCE: Elevate your recordings and produce studio-quality content with our Internet revolution wireless microphone for iPhone. Whether it's video recording, vlogging, podcasting, live streaming, interviews, voiceovers, ASMR, or online classes, our advanced mic ensures exceptional sound clarity and precision. Elevate your audio game to new heights and captivate your audience with every word and every note with wireless microphone.

EXTENDED BATTERY LIFE WIRELESS MIC IN A POCKET-SIZED POWERHOUSE: Elevate your on-the-go recordings with our mini microphone for iPhone. Concealing cutting-edge technology within its tiny form factor, this tiny microphone lets you effortlessly carry a professional recording studio in your pocket. With exceptional battery life of bluetooth mic lasting up to 6 hours you can confidently capture high-quality audio during extended recording sessions with our wireless mic.

EMBRACE VERSATILITY AND COMPATIBILITY WITH LAVALIER MIC: Our exclusive dual microphone pack offers endless possibilities with two high-performance wireless mics in one bundle. Our clip microphone is designed for seamless compatibility with all IOS devices featuring a lightning port. Our mini microphone is perfect for interviews, interactive sessions, multi-source audio recording, conferences, and more. The wireless microphone for YouTube allows content creators to move freely.

WIRELESS LAPEL MIC 360° AUDIO IMMERSION & EXTENDED SIGNAL FREEDOM: Elevate your iPhone recordings with our mini bluetooth microphone. Embrace the advantage of a circular pick-up pattern, our vlogging microphone capturing sound from all sides and directions. Immerse your audience in lifelike audio experiences with a recording microphone . Enjoy up to 60 feet of stable signal transmission, Walk around freely with phone mic, assured that you won't experience any signal loss.

STUDIO-QUALITY WIRELESS MICROPHONE FOR IPHONE: Elevate your recordings with our internet revolution microphone for iphone video recording. Experience studio-quality content in video recording, live streaming, voiceovers, online classes with bluetooth lapel microphone wireless. Our bluetooth microphone ensures exceptional sound clarity & precision. Enjoy pristine audio with wireless lavalier microphones featuring advanced noise cancellation technology.

PLUG AND PLAY LAVALIER MIC:- There's no need to install any app on your iPhone! Simply connect the receiver of the bluetooth mic to your device, switch on the wireless mini microphones, and you're good to go. Thanks to the innovative auto-pairing feature, our wireless lavalier microphones will synchronize automatically with each other, our wireless lapel mic allowing them to be operational in no time. It's as simple as that!

RECORDING MICROPHONE UP TO 60 FEET STABLE SIGNAL TRANSMISSION:- The iPhone microphone designed for video recording is equipped with an impressive feature that ensures a stable signal transmission covering a remarkable range of up to 60 feet. This enhanced capability of the tiny wireless microphone grants you the freedom to move around unrestrictedly while capturing audio for your videos, without any apprehensions about encountering signal dropouts or interruptions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Plug & Play No application needs to be installed on your iPhone! Just connect the receiver to your device and turn the mics on. Thanks to the unique auto-pairing system, our wireless Lavalier microphones will be automatically synchronized with each other and ready to work almost immediately. That’s it! 360° Omnidirectional Mic Our tiny microphones for iPhone have a circular pick-up pattern that records 360-degree audio. No matter where you are, these mini microphones will capture sound from all sides and all directions! Exceptionally Long Battery Life Our wireless lavalier microphones work perfectly for up to 6 hours, with a charging time of just 1-2 hours. The perfect choice for on-the-go recording!

Up to 60 Feet Working Distance This iPhone microphone for video recording offers an improved range of movement, allowing you to walk around freely without worrying about signal loss! Clear Sound Whether you are a professional speaker, musician, or presenter, our phone microphones for recording are a must-have for your toolkit. They offer convenience, flexibility, and superior sound quality that will help you deliver your message with confidence! Wide Compatibility These mini microphones can work with any IOS devices with a lightning port. For example, iPhone 7/ 7 Plus, 8/8 Plus, X/XR/XS/XS Max, 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max, 12/12 Pro, 13/ 13 mini, 14/ 14 Plus/ 14 Pro/ 14 Pro Max, and iPad 2/3/4, iPad Air/ Air 2, iPad Pro (1st, 2nd generation), etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got these as a gift and I was pleasantly surprised by how well it works. Everything came in the box on time and the mic was very good at picking up sound from a fairly long distance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: the quality is good for the price but it could be better cause it doesnt pick up the tone as well as i would like. But i still recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These were great starter mics for my daughter to start her sports media career with! Good quality recording.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Melted upon recharge
reviews.reviewText: I used these once for a video and they worked great. In trying to charge them up before leaving for a conference, they both began to overheat and completely melt. Neither will power back on. I’m seeing other reviews with similar experiences. I will be buying other microphones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been using them for a couple of days, so far no issues. Good, simple mics for that price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Upon placing the wireless microphone charger, it started to over heat. I attempted to use it and went to charge it and it got super hot which scared me so I unplugged it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plug and Play! Great sound. Easy to use and affordable!
reviews.reviewText: Plug and Play for my iPhone. The device charges up fast, and you plug the mini receiver into your iPhone using the USB C plug or plug it into your wall charger or computer. Once charged, plug the lightning end of the receiver into your phone. The instructions say that you should see an icon on your phone showing it plugged in, but not on an iPhone.Turn on the microphone by pressing the plug on the back of the microphone, and clip it to your shirt. You should see a green light that it is on, and open your recording device on your phone and start recording. The result is a high-quality recording. It is a bit "boomy" but adequate for many things, like podcasts or client recordings. The box is a great storage case for all the supplies too. The device works great; a simple, easy, and affordable way to have better recordings. I tried it from 60 feet away, works fantastic. I love this little device and two microphones!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Work With My iPhone and iPad
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this microphone set to make recordings on my iPhone.If you need to create a podcast, record sound, or conduct an interview, this microphone set might work for you. You can use a single microphone or use both at the same time. The microphones will clip onto a lapel or collar easily and attach securely. They charge via a USB cable (only one cable is included, so you'll need to provide your own cable if you need to charge both mics at the same time.)The receiver unit plugs into your iPhone or iPad via the lightning port. I have a case on my phone but it did not interfere with the connection. You might have an issue if you have a thick case, though. Once attached and turned on, the microphones connected to the receiver without issues.Placement of the microphones matters a lot. If you have the microphone too close to your mouth, the sound is distorted. If you have it too far away, the volume is insufficient. It took a little experimenting, but I was able to find the sweet spot without much trouble.For professional podcasters/iPhone videographers, this kit probably won't provide the quality needed. For more casual users, though, there is no reason to spend more.
